name: reality-capture-main
description: This project contains iTwin API SDK for ContextCapture and RealityDataAnalysis as well as reality data API utils, in typescript and python.

scripts.build: pnpm -r --filter "reality-capture" run build && pnpm -r --filter "reality-capture-node" run build && pnpm -r --filter=!reality-capture --filter=!reality-capture-node run build
